name: ProjectX
body:
### Welcome to ProjectX - Sciencenter at Ithaca.
The project aims aims to replace the touch-based interfaces by using gestures. This is a Kinect-based, gesture-driven, interactive interface which educates users about scientists and their key achievements.

### Authors and Contributors
Anagha Todalbagi (@anagha-todalbagi)


Jack Hayford (@jdhayford)


Rohit Prakash (@chochim)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
